title: FPS DROP HELP ME PLS
body:
Hi,

I have FPS issue since 5 days, i don t use the new skin. I repair my game, i reinstall it, i try to install it on my ssd and my other disk. I make an antivirus scan, my drivers are up to date, I disable DVR and Nvidia Share, I disable windows notif.
I followed the FPS Guide issues too.
I have a 960 Gaming - 4Go and an i5 6500 and 12 G DDR3 Ram, should i need to upgrade my computer ?
I don t know how to solve it i try everything, this fps drop is only on league of legend  ...
Sorry for my bad english, i hope you can help me !

ISushiz.

replies.body:
Since you've already worked through a comprehensive list of troubleshooting steps on your own already, I recommend we escalate this to our tech team. I'd like you to run some system logs using our [**Hextech App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach those logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can get back to you.

If you run into any issues, let me know.

Thx for your answer, i did it 5 days ago and i am waiting for your support to find a solution.
I just write this post in case someone find how to solve it.
I will wait the support find how to solve it.

Thank you again, and have a good day ! :)
